mdRecord.dcterms:title: Surgical tools set
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: F.G Otto & Sons Surgical Instruments [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Contained in wooden case; interior is stamped with manufacturer: "F.G Otto & Sons Surgical Instruments Trusses & C.; 64 Chatham Street New York." Set includes 1 saw, 4 knives of varying sizes, 3 picks, tourniquet, trephine, key to case, and a note, "To Dr. Daniel 7-9-47, compliments and best wishes--your grateful patient Dr. M F. Woodward, retired from U.S Gov. Ser? 1940."
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: medical instruments or apparatus
